projectGridLines.title: Financial Risk Management Framework for Chemical Processes
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop a framework integrating financial analysis and risk management for

chemical processes.

Skill sets: Aspen Hysys Chemical , Figma, AutoCAD, Excel, C Programming

Expected learning: 1. Problem solving and analysis 2. Communication 3. Client relationship

management 4. Professionalism 5. Product management

Specific courses required for project execution: Business communication, linguistics,

Securities Analysis and Portfolio Management, Derivatives & Risk Management, Fundamentals

of Finance & Accounting, financial management, business analysis and valuation

projectGridLines.title: Smart Sensor Network for Industrial Automation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop a smart sensor network for industrial automation, focusing on real-time task

scheduling, object-oriented design, data protection, and ethical practices.

Skill sets: C++, Flutter, Excel, SQL, Canva, UI/UX, Python

Expected learning: 1. Problem solving and analysis 2. Communication 3. Client relationship

management 4. Professionalism 5. Software Development

Specific courses required for project execution: Public policy, Principles of Economics,

Probability and Statistics

projectGridLines.title: Integrated Marketing Initiative
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Implementing comprehensive marketing strategies incorporating finance and

creative components.

Skill sets: SQL, Excel, UI/UX, Python, Canva

Expected learning: 1. Problem solving and analysis 2. Communication 3. Client relationship

management 4. Professionalism 5. Product Management

Specific courses required for project execution: Print & Audio Visual Advertisement,

Fundamentals of Finance & Accounting, Copywriting, Cross Cultural Skills, Principles of

Economics, Probability & Statistics, Cinematic Adaptation

projectGridLines.title: Smart Sensor Network for Industrial Automation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project involves the design, implementation, and testing of a smart sensor

network for industrial automation. The goal is to create a system that can monitor and control

various industrial processes in real-time using advanced sensors and control mechanisms

Skill sets:s C/C++, Python, or MATLAB, communication protocols (e.g., I2C, SPI,

UART),Simulation tools (e.g., MATLAB/Simulink, LTSpice)

Expected learning:Hands-on experience in designing and implementing a sensor network for

industrial applications. Integrating and calibrating various sensors for accurate data

acquisition

Specific courses required for project execution: Industrial Instrumentation and Control,

Analog Electronics, Power Electronics, Transducers and Measurement Techniques

projectGridLines.title: Technical Content Writer
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The aim of the project is to create high-quality, engaging content that bridges

biology, electrical engineering, and its application in Medical Instruments. You will develop

technical documents, marketing materials, and digital content, simplifying complex concepts

for diverse audiences. You will drive content strategies that enhance brand awareness and

customer engagement. Your role will involve crafting compelling narratives that resonate with

target audiences and support marketing campaigns. Proficiency in content management

systems and digital analytics tools, along with Technical expertise, are essential.

Skill sets: Canva, AdSense, GSuite, Python, SQL, Leadership

Expected learning: You will gain valuable experience in integrating technical and marketing

content, enhancing your skills in simplifying complex information and engaging diverse

audiences.

Specific courses required for project execution: Print and Audio-Visual Advertising, Medical

Instrumentation, Combinatorial Mathematics
